name: Babushka Battle
description:
Play babushka battle!

NOTE: Known bug is that there is an issue with placing Matryoshkas. It's too "quick" in movement. If you would like to play the game normally, download the RAR file. Or download the project from my Github for unity. :)

CONTROLS

WASDMOVESPACEJUMPLEFT MOUSESHOOTRIGHT MOUSEPLACE MATRYOSHKA
